question: While doing foreplay,kissing, etc.. is it allowed to say words like these Alhamdulillah, Masha allah, Jazakallah, etc....?
answer:
QUESTION

While doing foreplay,kissing, etc.. is it allowed to say words like these Alhamdulillah, Masha allah, Jazakallah, etc....?

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatoh

It is not appropriate to verbally say the name of Allah when being intimate with one wife. The name of Allah deserves to be uttered with respect and dignity. Uttering the name of Allah, when kissing is against Adab and etiquette.

And Allah knows best 

 

Checked and Approved by:

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
Darul Iftaa
